success_text: An email is coming your way, click on it to verify your account and in no time your will be able to create investigations with privacy as a priority
Un email está en camino, haz click en el link que hay dentro para verificar tu cuenta. Dentro de poco podrás crear investigaciones con la privacidad como prioridad

personal_data: Add the reasons why you need the personal data

title: Add consents
Añadir consentimientos
explanation: In order to create a consent agreement we need you write down the reason why you are asking for the personal data. These reasons why appear in the consent for the patient to understand what will be the use of that data
personal_data: Here are the personal data you are asking to the patients, please add an explanation of why each is necessary
A continuación encontrará los datos personales que ha pedido en el paso anterior. Por favor, añada una explicación de por qué son necesarios.
is_required: Is a required consent to participate in the investigation
Es un consentimiento obligatorio para participar en la investigation

Enhorabuena!

no_investigations: You don't have any investigations yet

error_password: Password has to be at least 7 characters long
La contraseña debe contener al menos 7 caracteres
error_length6: It has to be at least 6 characters long
Debe tener una longitud de al menos 6 caracteres
error_length2: It has to be at least 2 characters long
Debe tener una longitud de al menos 2 caracteres
error_not_empty: Este campo no puede estar vacío
error_not_same: Fields have to be the same
El valor tiene que ser igual

personal_data_header: These are the personal data that are required to participate in the investigation
Estos son los datos personales necesarios para participar en la investigación
